. Steve Ballmer formally introduced Windows 7 last month at an industry event in New York City. Steve Ballmer said Windows 7 is simple to use, responsive, and unobtrusively secure-all things Vista was not. The OS makes everyday use of a PC better, said Steve Ballmer . I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. . Gartner says Gmail has captured less than 1% of the enterprise e-mail market, counting only businesses with at least 100 paid seats. Managed services partners are jumping on board, though. A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program, says an MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained" more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers."
